# beginSeekingBackward()

**Instance Method**

Begins seeking backward through the media content.

## Declaration

```swift
func beginSeekingBackward()
```

## Discussion

Use this method to move the current playback position backward in time at an accelerated rate. Seeking begins when you call this method and continues until you call the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPlayback/endSeeking()] method.

This method has no effect on streamed content.

## Seeking within media

- **beginSeekingForward()**: Begins seeking forward through the media content.
- **endSeeking()**: Ends forward and backward seeking through the media content.

items.description: Ends forward and backward seeking through the media content.
